snippet: Thomas Bach is counting on his track record and long experience in the Olympic world to carry him to the top job in the International Olympic Committee.
abstract: Thomas Bach is counting on his track record and long experience in the Olympic world to carry him to the top job in the International Olympic Committee; Bach, who is a German lawyer, has become the first declared candidate in the race for IOC president
lead_paragraph: Thomas Bach is counting on his track record and long experience in the Olympic world to carry him to the top job in the International Olympic Committee.

headline.seo: Thomas Bach Declares for I.O.C. Post
